attributes.action: release all goverment documents automatically after 25 years to the public domain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As of the 31/12/2006 the people of the u.s.a. automatically had any goverment documents older than 25 years  automatically released into the public domain instead of having to request for them to be released in the first place.
(excluding anything considered of national security).this idea is very noble and i believe should be adopted by the british people.also their should be an independent dept.that deals with the security issues of what is to be withheld,political parties should not have the power to pick and choose,because the public only believe secrets are kept by the guilty.
